#summary Sample Application: Independent Component Analysis (ICA) Sample Application
#labels Type-SampleApps

 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-statistics-ica-bin.zip application]
 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-statistics-ica-src.zip source code]
 * Browse [https://code.google.com/p/accord/source/browse/trunk#trunk%2FSamples%2FStatistics%2FICA source code online].

This sample application shows how to compute and use [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Statistics_Analysis_IndependentComponentAnalysis.htm Independent Component Analysis (ICA)] to perform blind source separation of two mixed sound signals. By default, the application comes with two mixed audio recordings from a CNN
